definitions.text: a source of danger; a possibility of incurring loss or misfortune
examples: drinking alcohol is a health hazard

definitions.text: a state of danger involving risk
a venture undertaken without regard to possible loss or injury
examples: he saw the rewards but not the risks of crime
there was a danger he would do the wrong thing

definitions.text: pose a threat to; present a danger to
examples: The pollution is endangering the crops

definitions.text: put in a dangerous, disadvantageous, or difficult position
